00113 static void wm_init_reports(bContext *C)
00114 {
00115     BKE_reports_init(CTX_wm_reports(C), RPT_STORE);
00116 }
00117 static void wm_free_reports(bContext *C)
00118 {
00119     BKE_reports_clear(CTX_wm_reports(C));
00120 }

00122 int wm_start_with_console = 0; /* used in creator.c */
00123 
00124 /* only called once, for startup */
00125 void WM_init(bContext *C, int argc, const char **argv)
00126 {
00127     if (!G.background) {
00128         wm_ghost_init(C);   /* note: it assigns C to ghost! */
00129         wm_init_cursor_data();
00130     }
00131     GHOST_CreateSystemPaths();
00132     wm_operatortype_init();
00133     WM_menutype_init();
00134 
00135     set_free_windowmanager_cb(wm_close_and_free);   /* library.c */
00136     set_blender_test_break_cb(wm_window_testbreak); /* blender.c */
00137     DAG_editors_update_cb(ED_render_id_flush_update, ED_render_scene_update); /* depsgraph.c */
00138     
00139     ED_spacetypes_init();   /* editors/space_api/spacetype.c */
00140     
00141     ED_file_init();         /* for fsmenu */
00142     ED_init_node_butfuncs();    
00143     
00144     BLF_init(11, U.dpi); /* Please update source/gamengine/GamePlayer/GPG_ghost.cpp if you change this */
00145     BLF_lang_init();
00146     /* get the default database, plus a wm */
00147     WM_read_homefile(C, NULL, G.factory_startup);
00148 
00149     BLF_lang_set(NULL);
00150 
00151     /* note: there is a bug where python needs initializing before loading the
00152      * startup.blend because it may contain PyDrivers. It also needs to be after
00153      * initializing space types and other internal data.
00154      *
00155      * However cant redo this at the moment. Solution is to load python
00156      * before WM_read_homefile() or make py-drivers check if python is running.
00157      * Will try fix when the crash can be repeated. - campbell. */
00158 
00159 #ifdef WITH_PYTHON
00160     BPY_context_set(C); /* necessary evil */
00161     BPY_python_start(argc, argv);
00162 
00163     BPY_driver_reset();
00164     BPY_app_handlers_reset(FALSE); /* causes addon callbacks to be freed [#28068],
00165                                     * but this is actually what we want. */
00166     BPY_modules_load_user(C);
00167 #else
00168     (void)argc; /* unused */
00169     (void)argv; /* unused */
00170 #endif
00171 
00172     if (!G.background && !wm_start_with_console)
00173         GHOST_toggleConsole(3);
00174 
00175     wm_init_reports(C); /* reports cant be initialized before the wm */
00176 
00177     if (!G.background) {
00178         GPU_extensions_init();
00179         GPU_set_mipmap(!(U.gameflags & USER_DISABLE_MIPMAP));
00180         GPU_set_anisotropic(U.anisotropic_filter);
00181     
00182         UI_init();
00183     }
00184     
00185     clear_matcopybuf();
00186     ED_render_clear_mtex_copybuf();
00187 
00188     //  glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA,GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00189         
00190     ED_preview_init_dbase();
00191     
00192     WM_read_history();
00193 
00194     /* allow a path of "", this is what happens when making a new file */
00195 #if 0
00196     if (G.main->name[0] == 0)
00197         BLI_make_file_string("/", G.main->name, BLI_getDefaultDocumentFolder(), "untitled.blend");
00198 #endif
00199 
00200     BLI_strncpy(G.lib, G.main->name, FILE_MAX);
00201 }
00202 
00203 void WM_init_splash(bContext *C)
00204 {
00205     if ((U.uiflag & USER_SPLASH_DISABLE) == 0) {
00206         wmWindowManager *wm = CTX_wm_manager(C);
00207         wmWindow *prevwin = CTX_wm_window(C);
00208     
00209         if (wm->windows.first) {
00210             CTX_wm_window_set(C, wm->windows.first);
00211             WM_operator_name_call(C, "WM_OT_splash", WM_OP_INVOKE_DEFAULT, NULL);
00212             CTX_wm_window_set(C, prevwin);
00213         }
00214     }
00215 }
00216 
00217 int WM_init_game(bContext *C)
00218 {
00219     wmWindowManager *wm = CTX_wm_manager(C);
00220     wmWindow *win;
00221 
00222     ScrArea *sa;
00223     ARegion *ar = NULL;
00224 
00225     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00226 
00227     if (!scene) {
00228         // XXX, this should not be needed.
00229         Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
00230         scene = bmain->scene.first;
00231     }
00232 
00233     win = wm->windows.first;
00234 
00235     //first to get a valid window
00236     if (win)
00237         CTX_wm_window_set(C, win);
00238 
00239     sa = BKE_screen_find_big_area(CTX_wm_screen(C), SPACE_VIEW3D, 0);
00240     ar = BKE_area_find_region_type(sa, RGN_TYPE_WINDOW);
00241 
00242     // if we have a valid 3D view
00243     if (sa && ar) {
00244         ARegion *arhide;
00245 
00246         CTX_wm_area_set(C, sa);
00247         CTX_wm_region_set(C, ar);
00248 
00249         /* disable quad view */
00250         if (ar->alignment == RGN_ALIGN_QSPLIT)
00251             WM_operator_name_call(C, "SCREEN_OT_region_quadview", WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, NULL);
00252 
00253         /* toolbox, properties panel and header are hidden */
00254         for (arhide = sa->regionbase.first; arhide; arhide = arhide->next) {
00255             if (arhide->regiontype != RGN_TYPE_WINDOW) {
00256                 if (!(arhide->flag & RGN_FLAG_HIDDEN)) {
00257                     ED_region_toggle_hidden(C, arhide);
00258                 }
00259             }
00260         }
00261 
00262         /* full screen the area */
00263         if (!sa->full) {
00264             ED_screen_full_toggle(C, win, sa);
00265         }
00266 
00267         /* Fullscreen */
00268         if ((scene->gm.playerflag & GAME_PLAYER_FULLSCREEN)) {
00269             WM_operator_name_call(C, "WM_OT_window_fullscreen_toggle", WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, NULL);
00270             wm_get_screensize(&ar->winrct.xmax, &ar->winrct.ymax);
00271             ar->winx = ar->winrct.xmax + 1;
00272             ar->winy = ar->winrct.ymax + 1;
00273         }
00274         else {
00275             GHOST_RectangleHandle rect = GHOST_GetClientBounds(win->ghostwin);
00276             ar->winrct.ymax = GHOST_GetHeightRectangle(rect);
00277             ar->winrct.xmax = GHOST_GetWidthRectangle(rect);
00278             ar->winx = ar->winrct.xmax + 1;
00279             ar->winy = ar->winrct.ymax + 1;
00280             GHOST_DisposeRectangle(rect);
00281         }
00282 
00283         WM_operator_name_call(C, "VIEW3D_OT_game_start", WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, NULL);
00284 
00285         sound_exit();
00286 
00287         return 1;
00288     }
00289     else {
00290         ReportTimerInfo *rti;
00291 
00292         BKE_report(&wm->reports, RPT_ERROR, "No valid 3D View found. Game auto start is not possible.");
00293 
00294         /* After adding the report to the global list, reset the report timer. */
00295         WM_event_remove_timer(wm, NULL, wm->reports.reporttimer);
00296 
00297         /* Records time since last report was added */
00298         wm->reports.reporttimer = WM_event_add_timer(wm, CTX_wm_window(C), TIMER, 0.02);
00299 
00300         rti = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ReportTimerInfo), "ReportTimerInfo");
00301         wm->reports.reporttimer->customdata = rti;
00302     }
00303     return 0;
00304 }

00306 /* free strings of open recent files */
00307 static void free_openrecent(void)
00308 {
00309     struct RecentFile *recent;
00310     
00311     for (recent = G.recent_files.first; recent; recent = recent->next)
00312         MEM_freeN(recent->filepath);
00313     
00314     BLI_freelistN(&(G.recent_files));
00315 }

00326 /* called in creator.c even... tsk, split this! */
00327 /* note, doesnt run exit() call WM_exit() for that */
00328 void WM_exit_ext(bContext *C, const short do_python)
00329 {
00330     wmWindow *win;
00331 
00332     sound_exit();
00333 
00334 
00335     /* first wrap up running stuff, we assume only the active WM is running */
00336     /* modal handlers are on window level freed, others too? */
00337     /* note; same code copied in wm_files.c */
00338     if (C && CTX_wm_manager(C)) {
00339         
00340         WM_jobs_stop_all(CTX_wm_manager(C));
00341         
00342         for (win = CTX_wm_manager(C)->windows.first; win; win = win->next) {
00343             
00344             CTX_wm_window_set(C, win);  /* needed by operator close callbacks */
00345             WM_event_remove_handlers(C, &win->handlers);
00346             WM_event_remove_handlers(C, &win->modalhandlers);
00347             ED_screen_exit(C, win, win->screen);
00348         }
00349     }
00350     wm_operatortype_free();
00351     wm_dropbox_free();
00352     WM_menutype_free();
00353     
00354     /* all non-screen and non-space stuff editors did, like editmode */
00355     if (C)
00356         ED_editors_exit(C);
00357 
00358 //  XXX 
00359 //  BIF_GlobalReebFree();
00360 //  BIF_freeRetarget();
00361     BIF_freeTemplates(C);
00362     
00363     free_ttfont(); /* bke_font.h */
00364 
00365     free_openrecent();
00366     
00367     BKE_freecubetable();
00368     
00369     ED_preview_free_dbase();  /* frees a Main dbase, before free_blender! */
00370 
00371     if (C && CTX_wm_manager(C))
00372         wm_free_reports(C);  /* before free_blender! - since the ListBases get freed there */
00373 
00374     seq_free_clipboard(); /* sequencer.c */
00375     BKE_tracking_free_clipboard();
00376         
00377     free_blender();  /* blender.c, does entire library and spacetypes */
00378 //  free_matcopybuf();
00379     free_anim_copybuf();
00380     free_anim_drivers_copybuf();
00381     free_fmodifiers_copybuf();
00382     free_posebuf();
00383 
00384     BLF_exit();
00385 
00386 #ifdef WITH_INTERNATIONAL
00387     BLF_free_unifont();
00388 #endif
00389     
00390     ANIM_keyingset_infos_exit();
00391     
00392     RE_FreeAllRender();
00393     RE_engines_exit();
00394     
00395 //  free_txt_data();
00396     
00397 
00398 #ifdef WITH_PYTHON
00399     /* option not to close python so we can use 'atexit' */
00400     if (do_python) {
00401         /* XXX - old note */
00402         /* before free_blender so py's gc happens while library still exists */
00403         /* needed at least for a rare sigsegv that can happen in pydrivers */
00404 
00405         /* Update for blender 2.5, move after free_blender because blender now holds references to PyObject's
00406          * so decref'ing them after python ends causes bad problems every time
00407          * the pyDriver bug can be fixed if it happens again we can deal with it then */
00408         BPY_python_end();
00409     }
00410 #else
00411     (void)do_python;
00412 #endif
00413 
00414     GPU_global_buffer_pool_free();
00415     GPU_free_unused_buffers();
00416     GPU_extensions_exit();
00417 
00418     if (!G.background) {
00419         BKE_undo_save_quit();  /* saves quit.blend if global undo is on */
00420     }
00421     BKE_reset_undo(); 
00422     
00423     ED_file_exit(); /* for fsmenu */
00424 
00425     UI_exit();
00426     BKE_userdef_free();
00427 
00428     RNA_exit(); /* should be after BPY_python_end so struct python slots are cleared */
00429     
00430     wm_ghost_exit();
00431 
00432     CTX_free(C);
00433 #ifdef WITH_GAMEENGINE
00434     SYS_DeleteSystem(SYS_GetSystem());
00435 #endif
00436     
00437     GHOST_DisposeSystemPaths();
00438 
00439     if (MEM_get_memory_blocks_in_use() != 0) {
00440         printf("Error: Not freed memory blocks: %d\n", MEM_get_memory_blocks_in_use());
00441         MEM_printmemlist();
00442     }
00443     wm_autosave_delete();
00444     
00445     printf("\nBlender quit\n");
00446     
00447 #ifdef WIN32   
00448     /* ask user to press enter when in debug mode */
00449     if (G.debug & G_DEBUG) {
00450         printf("press enter key to exit...\n\n");
00451         getchar();
00452     }
00453 #endif 
00454 }
00455 
00456 void WM_exit(bContext *C)
00457 {
00458     WM_exit_ext(C, 1);
00459     exit(G.afbreek == 1);
00460 }
